description:
Looking for a PHP Developer with good knoweldge of CodeIgniter framework. Remote development, maximum 10 hours per week/30-40 hours per month.

Essential Skills:
- An understanding of object orientated programming in PHP 5.X 
- In depth knowledge of MySQL 5.X including database optimisation, REST & SOAP API services & appending large datasets between API services 
- Great understanding of jQuery and client side Javascript 
- Knowledge of PHP MVC frameworks, most notably CodeIgniter is a must 
- At least 3 years experience as a programmer 
- Good spoken English

Beneficial Skills: 
- MySQLi coding experience 
- Great knowledge of Apache and web server orientated administration (NGINX is a plus) 
- Great knowledge of node.js 
- Knoweldge of Laravel

Please apply with a CV with PHP and Javascript projects portfolio.
title: PHP + CodeIgniter 30-40 hours PER MONTH

assignments.title: For Evgeniy B. - Titanium Bugs Fixing
